message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to make a great deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to negotiate further. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on it.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $875000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $887500. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to negotiate further. I'm willing to pay $880000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on it.
